fields.description: Unique system ID for this booking.
fields.label: Booking Number

fields.description: The member making the reservation.
fields.label: Member

fields.description: Specify if this is a short-term or multi-day booking.
fields.label: Booking Type

fields.description: Current status of the reservation.
fields.label: Status
fields.options:
Draft
Confirmed
Checked-In
Completed
Cancelled
No-Show

fields.description: How the booking was received.
fields.label: Source

fields.description: The specific room or desk being booked.
fields.label: Space

fields.description: Automatically fetched location of the selected space.
fields.label: Location

fields.description: The primary date for the booking.
fields.label: Booking Date

fields.description: Planned start time.
fields.label: Start Time

fields.description: Planned end time.
fields.label: End Time

fields.description: Total calculated hours for the session.
fields.label: Duration Hours

fields.description: Check if booking covers the entire business day.
fields.label: All Day

fields.description: Method used to calculate the price.
fields.label: Rate Type

fields.description: Price per hour if applicable.
fields.label: Hourly Rate

fields.description: Price per day if applicable.
fields.label: Daily Rate

fields.description: Associate with an active membership for credits or discounts.
fields.label: Membership

fields.description: Base total before services and discounts.
fields.label: Subtotal

fields.description: Extra amenities like catering or equipment.
fields.label: Additional Services

fields.description: Total cost of all items in the services table.
fields.label: Services Total

fields.description: Percentage to deduct from subtotal.
fields.label: Discount Percent

fields.description: Calculated discount value.
fields.label: Discount Amount

fields.description: Final amount to be paid (Subtotal + Services - Discount).
fields.label: Total Amount

fields.description: The exact timestamp the member arrived.
fields.label: Actual Check In

fields.description: The exact timestamp the member departed.
fields.label: Actual Check Out

fields.description: Staff member who processed the check-in.
fields.label: Checked In By

fields.description: Indicates if biometric or digital door access was activated.
fields.label: Access Granted
